USED HONDA BR-V 1.5 COMFORT CVT A/T 2021 FOR SALE AT HONDA CENTURION IN PRETORIA.

Balance of 5 Years / 200 000 Km Warranty & 4 Years / 60 000 Km Service Plan.
FEATURES Include: Airbags, Aircon, Alloy Wheels, Central Locking, Climate Control, Electric Mirrors & Windows, PDC, Radio with USB Port, Bluetooth, 7 Seater & 210mm Ground Clearance.

Price excludes delivery and registration fees.
